resources.string: "A material metaphor is the unifying theory of a rationalized space and a system of motion." "The material is grounded in tactile reality, inspired by the study of paper and ink, yet " "technologically advanced and open to imagination and magic.\n" "Surfaces and edges of the material provide visual cues that are grounded in reality. The " "use of familiar tactile attributes helps users quickly understand affordances. Yet the " "flexibility of the material creates new affordances that supercede those in the physical " "world, without breaking the rules of physics."

Inter Departmental Sports Events are back, and it promises to be bigger and more extravagant than ever! The annual intra college sports meet, spanning across several days commences with the Opening Ceremony and would comprise competitive events across 12 disciplines namely Cricket, Football, Volleyball, Basketball, Tug of War, Athletics, Badminton, Chess, Carrom, Table Tennis, Pool, Kabaddi and Kho-Kho. The wide assortment of indoor and outdoor events that Sports Meet offers provides a huge platform for the students to showcase their talents in various sports and instils the message to rise above our limits and achieve the improbable. It includes the feeling of righteousness, prudence and brotherhood, and reinstates the fact that Ajay Kumar Garg Engineering College shapes up its students to achieve excellence in all spheres of life. So, the seven contingents CSE, EC, EN, ME, IT, CE+EI and MBA+MCA are all ready in this rip-roaring competition to achieve the final victory. Are you?
Who do you think will win?
You have already voted in this Poll
